name: couchtube
description: CouchTube is a self-hosted multimedia platform that enables users to host, stream, and organize local video or audio files through a simple, responsive web UI. Itâ€™s ideal for home media setups and family cloud entertainment.
features: Media Streaming: Stream local video and audio files smoothly. Personal Netflix experience.
Responsive UI: Clean interface that works on all devices. Watch anywhere, anytime.
File Organization: Organize media libraries with folders and metadata. Keep collections tidy.
Home Entertainment: Perfect for family media servers and home clouds. Share with loved ones.
Simple Setup: Easy deployment with minimal configuration. Start streaming quickly.
Self-Hosted: Keep your media private on your own server. No subscription fees ever.
